title: Crypto Currency WebApp
description: Develop a responsive cryptocurrency website using real-time APIs for market data, featuring dynamic visualizations and seamless updates on current trends.

title: Google Keep Clone
description: This project is a Google Keep clone built with React, enabling users to create, edit, and delete notes with a user-friendly interface and local storage for data persistence.

title: Movie Library
description: Created a full-stack Movie Library app with user authentication, personal lists, and OMDB API integration, deployed on Render with MongoDB Atlas.

title: Web Chat
description: Built a chat app with the MERN stack and Socket.io for real-time communication, featuring JWT authentication and a responsive UI with Redux.

title: Customer Management System
description: Created a headless CMS for seamless content management via API, enabling flexible integration with various frontends and dynamic content delivery.

title: React Video Player
description: Developed a React video player that supports multiple video formats, features playback controls, and offers a customizable interface for an enhanced user experience.

title: Todo List
description: Created a Todo List application that allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks, featuring a user-friendly interface and local storage for data persistence.

title: Weather
description: Built a React weather app that delivers real-time weather data and forecasts with a user-friendly interface.

title: Simon Game
description: Developed a Simon game in JavaScript that challenges players to repeat a sequence of colors and sounds with increasing difficulty.

title: Movie Database
description: Built a movie database application in C++ that allows users to add, search, and manage movie entries, featuring a command-line interface for easy navigation.

title: Tinder for Dogs
description: Developed a Tinder-like webpage for dogs using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring user profiles, swipe functionality, and a visually appealing layout for dog lovers.

title: About a company
description: Built a webpage for a service-providing company to showcase details and services with a clean, responsive design.

title: Drum kit
description: Developed a drum kit web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that allows users to play different drum sounds by clicking on visual elements or using keyboard keys.

title: Tic Tac Toe Android App
description: Created a Tic Tac Toe game for Android that allows users to play against each other or the computer, featuring an intuitive interface and score tracking.

title: Mass Mail Dispatcher
description: Built a web application, implementing CSV file processing, email validation, and bulk email dispatching features.

title: Portfolio
description: Developed a portfolio featuring a sticky navbar, hero section, contact information, dynamic projects and recommendations sections, and a skills page with an add skill feature and API integrations.
